pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.2.2: The commentary, Sp.2.693, defines _pakkhasaṅkantā_ as joining another religion: _Pakkhasaṅkantā vāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā_, “_Pakkhasaṅkantā vā_ means one who has joined the ascetics of another religion.” Yet the idea of _pakkha_, “a faction”, also refers to factions within the Sangha, for instance, when the Sangha is split into different communities (_nānāsaṁvāsa_) that no longer perform legal procedures together.
